resources.string: The Regatta Timer App for Smartwatches acts like an Optimum Time Series 3 watch which is used on sailing regattas. It has all the timer and stop watch functionality implemented as the regular watch.
If a count down time is set it starts/stops the couting down. Otherwise a stop watch (count up) ist started/stopped.
Synchronizes the timer in count down mode to the next whole minute.
Resets the the count down and stop watch.
Adds the configured amount of time to the count down.
Changing interval mode between repeating and up/down.
Changing amount of time to be added. Available modes: 5,4,1,0 / 3M / 2M / 1M
